TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolStripComboBox extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost

summary.span: 表示適當呈現在 中的 。

span.span: Represents a that is properly rendered in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是適合裝載在。 is the optimized for hosting in a . 裝載的控制項的屬性和事件的子集會公開在層級，但基礎控制項是完全可透過存取屬性。A subset of the hosted control's properties and events are exposed at the level, but the underlying control is fully accessible through the property. A顯示結合的編輯欄位，讓使用者從清單中選取或輸入新的文字。A displays an editing field combined with a , allowing the user to select from the list or to enter new text. 根據預設，會顯示與隱藏的下拉式清單編輯欄位。By default, a displays an edit field with a hidden drop-down list. 屬性會決定要顯示的下拉式方塊的樣式。The property determines the style of combo box to display. 您可以輸入簡單下拉式清單中，永遠顯示清單，下拉式清單方塊中，其中是無法編輯的文字部分，而您必須選取要檢視下拉式清單方塊箭號，或預設下拉式清單方塊中，其中的文字部分是 ed 所允許的值itable 且使用者必須按方向鍵來檢視清單。You can enter a value that allows for a simple drop-down, where the list always displays, a drop-down list box, where the text portion is not editable and you must select an arrow to view the drop-down list box, or the default drop-down list box, where the text portion is editable and the user must press the arrow key to view the list. 若要一律顯示使用者無法編輯的清單，請使用控制項。To always display a list that the user cannot edit, use a control. 若要加入至清單的物件，在執行階段，請將指派的物件參考陣列方法。To add objects to the list at run time, assign an array of object references with the method. 然後，此清單會顯示每個物件的預設字串值。The list then displays the default string value for each object. 您可以加入具有個別物件方法。You can add individual objects with the method. 除了顯示和選取的功能，也提供功能，可讓您有效率地將項目加入並找出清單的項目內的文字。In addition to display and selection functionality, the also provides features that enable you to efficiently add items to the and to find text within the items of the list. 和方法可讓您新增的項目大量不用每次重繪控制項項目加入至清單。The and methods enable you to add a large number of items to the without the control being repainted each time an item is added to the list. 和方法可讓您搜尋包含特定的搜尋字串的清單中的項目。The and methods enable you to search for an item in the list that contains a specific search string. 使用屬性來取得或設定目前的項目在下拉式清單中，並使用屬性來取得或設定下拉式清單中的目前項目的參考。Use the property to get or set the current item in the drop-down list, and use the property to get or set a reference to the current item in the drop-down list. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範具有各種屬性設定，包括自動完成。The following code example demonstrates a with various property settings, including automatic completion. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.CommonProps#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.CommonProps/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.CommonProps#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.CommonProps/VB/form1.vb#0)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用， ，和屬性來建立自動完成輸入的字串比較輸入中維護的來源的所有字串的前置詞的前置詞。Use the , , and properties to create a that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source. 這適用於所在 Url、 地址、 檔案名稱或命令會經常輸入的控制項。This is useful for controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered. 使用屬性是選擇性的但是您必須設定屬性才能使用。The use of the property is optional, but you must set the property to in order to use . 您必須使用和屬性放在一起。You must use the and properties together. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定各種語法屬性，包括屬性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting various properties, including the property. summary.span: 當項目一次一筆加入 時可維護效能。

span.span: Maintains performance when items are added to the one at a time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會讓控制項繪製直到方法呼叫。This method prevents the control from painting until the method is called. 將項目加入，最好是使用方法，透過屬性。The preferred way to add items to the is to use the method through the property of the . 這可讓您一次加入清單的項目陣列。This enables you to add an array of items to the list at one time. 不過，如果您想要加入的項目一於使用方法，您可以使用方法，以防止重繪控制項每個項目新增至清單的時間。However, if you want to add items one at a time using the method, you can use the method to prevent the control from repainting the each time an item is added to the list. 完成的工作項目加入清單後，請呼叫方法，以啟用來重新繪製。Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the method to enable the to repaint. 將項目加入這種方式可以防止重繪閃動繪製期間當正在大量項目加入至清單。This way of adding items can prevent flicker during the drawing of the when a large number of items are being added to the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ToolStripComboBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStripComboBox1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 將項目加入，最好是使用方法，透過屬性。The preferred way to add items to the is to use the method through the property of the . 這可讓您一次加入清單的項目陣列。This enables you to add an array of items to the list at one time. 不過，如果您想要加入的項目一於使用方法，您可以使用方法，以防止重繪控制項每個項目新增至清單的時間。However, if you want to add items one at a time using the method, you can use the method to prevent the control from repainting the each time an item is added to the list. 完成的工作項目加入清單後，請呼叫方法，以啟用來重新繪製。Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the method to enable the to repaint. 將項目加入這種方式可以防止重繪閃動繪製期間當正在大量項目加入至清單。This way of adding items can prevent flicker during the drawing of the when a large number of items are being added to the list.

summary.span: 尋找 中第一個以指定字串為開頭的項目。

span.span: Finds the first item in the that starts with the specified string.

returns.span: 找到第一個項目之以零為起始的索引，如果沒有找到符合的，則傳回 -1。

span.span: The zero-based index of the first item found; returns -1 if no match is found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所執行的搜尋不區分大小寫。The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive. `s`參數是要比較的下拉式方塊的清單中的項目相關聯的文字子字串。The `s` parameter is a substring to compare against the text associated with the items in the combo box list. 搜尋執行進行局部比對從文字的開頭開始，並傳回第一個項目在清單中符合指定的子字串。The search performs a partial match starting from the beginning of the text, and returning the first item in the list that matches the specified substring. 然後，您可以執行工作，例如移除包含搜尋文字的項目或變更項目的文字。You can then perform tasks, such as removing the item that contains the search text or changing the item's text. 一旦找到指定的文字，如果您想要搜尋的文字中的其他執行個體，使用方法，以指定起始索引。Once you have found the specified text, if you want to search for other instances of the text in the , use method to specify a starting index within the . 如果您想要執行精確的字詞相符而不是在部分符合的搜尋，使用方法。If you want to perform a search for an exact word match instead of a partial match, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所執行的搜尋不區分大小寫。The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive. `s`參數是要比較的下拉式方塊的清單中的項目相關聯的文字子字串。The `s` parameter is a substring to compare against the text associated with the items in the combo box list. 搜尋執行部分的比對，從頭開始於指定索引處的文字，然後傳回第一個項目清單中，符合指定的子字串。The search performs a partial match starting from the beginning of the text at the specified index, and returns the first item in the list that matches the specified substring. 然後，您可以執行工作，例如移除包含搜尋文字的項目或變更項目的文字。You can then perform tasks, such as removing the item that contains the search text or changing the item's text. 一旦找到指定的文字，如果您想要搜尋的文字中的其他執行個體，使用此方法來指定內的起始索引。Once you have found the specified text, if you want to search for other instances of the text in the , use this method to specify a starting index within the . 如果您想要執行精確的字詞相符而不是在部分符合的搜尋，使用方法。If you want to perform a search for an exact word match instead of a partial match, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來取得或設定的顯示樣式。Use the property to get or set the display style of the . 從.NET Framework 4.5.2 中，如果屬性設定為或，可能會調整大小的下拉式箭號。Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, if the property is set to or , the drop-down arrow may be resized. 調整大小取決於系統 DPI 設定時的 app.config 檔案包含下列項目：Resizing is determined by the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定各種語法屬性，包括屬性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting various properties, including the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性設定為`true`，控制項會自動調整大小以確保不部分顯示項目。When this property is set to `true`, the control automatically resizes to ensure that an item is not partially displayed. 如果您想要維護的原始大小根據表單的空間需求，將此屬性設定為`false`。If you want to maintain the original size of the based on the space requirements of your form, set this property to `false`. 如果不包含任何項目，這個屬性沒有任何作用。If the does not contain any items, this property has no effect. 設定屬性重設屬性`false`。Setting the property resets the property to `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnDropDown(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnDropDown (e As EventArgs)

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 僅當使用者變更下拉式方塊選取項目時，就會引發。 is raised only when the user changes the combo box selection. 請勿使用或來擷取使用者的變更，因為選取以程式設計方式變更時，也會引發這些事件。Do not use or to capture user changes, because those events are also raised when the selection changes programmatically. 當您設定時，也會引發這個事件。This event is also raised when you set . 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆寫新增或避免同步處理控制項事件的方法。Override the method to add or prevent the synchronizing of control events. 如果您覆寫並連結這裡事件時，會將它們攔截使用方法。If you override and hook up events here, unhook them by using the method. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

param.name: start
param.span: 文字方塊中目前的文字選取範圍中第一個字元的位置。

span.span: The position of the first character in the current text selection within the text box.
The number of characters to select.

summary.span: 在 的可編輯部分中選取某個範圍的文字。

span.span: Selects a range of text in the editable portion of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您想要設定控制項的文字中的第一個字元的開始位置，設定`start`參數為零。If you want to set the start position to the first character in the control's text, set the `start` parameter to zero. 您可以使用這個方法，以選取的子字串的文字，例如當透過控制項的文字搜尋和取代的資訊。You can use this method to select a substring of text, such as when searching through the text of the control and replacing information.

span.span: The is less than zero.
-or-
minus is less than zero.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SelectAll() cil managed

summary.span: 在 的可編輯部分中選取所有文字。

span.span: Selects all the text in the editable portion of the .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SelectedIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定目前選取項目的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index specifying the currently selected item.

value.span: 目前選取項目之以零為起始的索引。

span.span: A zero-based index of the currently selected item.

value.span: 如果未選取任何項目，將傳回負一 (-1)。

span.span: A value of negative one (-1) is returned if no item is selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會指出下拉式方塊清單中目前選取之項目的以零為起始的索引。This property indicates the zero-based index of the currently selected item in the combo box list. 設定新的索引會引發事件。Setting a new index raises the event. **請注意**以取消選取目前選取的項目，設定為-1。**Note** To deselect the currently selected item, set the to -1.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SelectedIndexChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於 屬性的值已變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ToolStripComboBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStripComboBox1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#581](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#581)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#581](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#581)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ SelectedItem { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定目前在 中選取的項目。

span.span: Gets or sets currently selected item in the .

value.span: 目前所選取項目的物件；如果目前沒有選取的項目，則為 。

span.span: The object that is the currently selected item or if there is no currently selected item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您將屬性，此物件嘗試使該物件清單中目前選取的一個。When you set the property to an object, the attempts to make that object the currently selected one in the list. 如果在清單中找到物件，它會顯示在編輯部分和屬性設定為對應的索引。If the object is found in the list, it is displayed in the edit portion of the and the property is set to the corresponding index. 如果物件不在清單中，存在屬性留在目前的值。If the object does not exist in the list, the property is left at its current value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SelectedText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定在 的可編輯部分中選取的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is selected in the editable portion of a .

value.span: 字串，表示下拉式方塊中目前所選取的文字。

span.span: A string that represents the currently selected text in the combo box.

value.span: 如果 設定為 ，則傳回的值是空字串 ("")。

span.span: If is set to , the return value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以將文字指派給這個屬性，變更下拉式方塊中目前選取的文字。You can assign text to this property to change the text currently selected in the combo box. 如果下拉式方塊中目前不選取任何文字，這個屬性會傳回零長度字串。If no text is currently selected in the combo box, this property returns a zero-length string.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SelectionLength { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定在 可編輯部分中選取的字元數。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of characters selected in the editable portion of the .
The number of characters selected in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要判斷是否任何字元中目前所選取的下拉式方塊控制項選取的文字上執行作業之前，您可以使用這個屬性。You can use this property to determine whether any characters are currently selected in the combo box control before performing operations on the selected text. 當值屬性設定為值大於控制項的值的文字內的字元數，屬性設定為完整的值減掉控制項內的文字長度屬性 (如果指定的任何值屬性)。When the value of the property is set to a value that is larger than the number of characters within the text of the control, the value of the property is set to the entire length of text within the control minus the value of the property (if any value is specified for the property).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SelectionStart { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 中所選文字的起始索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the starting index of text selected in the .

value.span: 在目前文字選取的字串中第一個字元之以零為起始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of the first character in the string of the current text selection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在控制項中不選取任何文字，則這個屬性會指出新文字的插入點。If no text is selected in the control, this property indicates the insertion point for new text. 如果您為控制項中文字的長度超過設定這個屬性，在選取範圍開始位置位於最後一個字元之後。If you set this property to a location beyond the length of the text in the control, the selection start position is placed after the last character. 文字方塊控制項中選取文字時，變更這個屬性可以發行的值屬性。When text is selected in the text box control, changing this property can release the value of the property. 如果所指出的位置之後控制項中的其餘文字屬性小於的值屬性、 值屬性就會自動減少。If the remaining text in the control after the position indicated by the property is less than the value of the property, the value of the property is automatically decreased. 值屬性永遠不會造成增加屬性。The value of the property never causes an increase in the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Sorted { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 中的項目是否會排序。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the items in the are sorted.

value.span: 如果下拉式方塊已排序，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the combo box is sorted; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會指定是否排序與現有項目，並新增到適當的排序位置清單中的項目。This property specifies whether the sorts existing entries and add new entries to the appropriate sorted position in the list. 您可以使用這個屬性，來自動排序中的項目。You can use this property to automatically sort items in a . 當項目新增至排序，項目會移至已排序的清單中的適當位置。As items are added to a sorted , the items are moved to the appropriate location in the sorted list. 當您將屬性設定為`false`，新的項目加入現有清單的結尾。When you set the property to `false`, new items are added to the end of the existing list. 不區分大小寫，而依字母順序遞增順序排序。The sort is case-insensitive and in alphabetically ascending order. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定各種語法屬性，包括屬性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting various properties, including the property. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.CommonProps#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.CommonProps/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.CommonProps#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.CommonProps/VB/form1.vb#1)]
